ygData.subject: Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: As Fracturcon checks for internal damage from the two Maximal counter attacks he reassesses the situation.  Despite his dislike for both Predicon & Maximal

Subject: Beast Wars

From: "Michael Stadnik" <mstadnik@...>

As Fracturcon checks for internal damage from the two Maximal counter attac=
ks he reassesses the situation.  Despite his dislike for both Predicon & Ma=
ximal factions he knows that Maximals favor diplomacy over fighting.  He de=
cides he will aid the outnumbered Maximals in the Ark by helping them drive=
 out the invading Predicon force.  Fracturcon: "Computer, activate 3 Sentin=
al drones and dispatch to my location.  Post drones 100 yards from the Ark =
& program them to fire at any Predicon it detects."  
Fracturcon knows if h=
e can help the Maximal force drive the Preds out then they'll be inclined t=
o listen to what he has to say.  "Internal reapirs are 70% complete, good e=
nough to kick some Pred a**.  Before I go in I'll let everyone know I'm her=
e."  Fracturcon opens his missile compartments on his arms & fires 4 concus=
sion missiles at the Ark to shake everyone up.  He then charges into the Ar=
k looking for any Pred scum to take out........
